metadata.name: Summer Garden
metadata.description:
Let's turn to the human being - the most beautiful creature our world has to offer! 
It is a well-known fact that in ancient times, the human being was worshiped more than ever.  
Ancient Greek and Roman gods were, in fact, human given their passions and sins. 
The human body was regarded as a work of art!

A human movement in the context of a city is in effect в a fleeting momentum that will never reoccur. 
Just like light and shadow are elusive in our everyday life, so is every move of a human being - elusive, fleeting and irretrievable.  
Human beings in the city without the city. 
Frozen sculptures.
